Package math.geom2d

geom2d: planar geometry toolbox.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AbstractDomain2D Interface for shapes that draws an 'interior' and an 'exterior'.
AbstractPolygon2D Represent any class made of a finite set of simply connected edges.
Bijection2D Interface for all bijective transformations in the euclidean plane.
Boundary2D A Boundary2D is the curve which defines the countour of a domain in the plane.
Conic2D Interface for all conics : parametric conics, or ellipses, parabolas, and hyperbolas.
ContinuousBoundary2D a continuous boundary is a continuous oriented curve which delimites a planar domain.
ContinuousCurve2D Interface for all curves which can be drawn with one stroke.
ContinuousOrientedCurve2D Defines a part of the boundary of a planar domain.
Curve2D Interface for all linear and pieces smooth curves : polylines, conics, lines ...
OrientedCurve2D An OrientedCurve2D defines an 'inside' and an 'outside'.
Projection2D interface for projections in the plane : projections on a line, on a circle, ...
Shape2D Main interface for all geometric objects, including points, lines, curves, or planar regions...
SmoothCurve2D Interface for smooth and continuous curves.
Transform2D general class for all transformation in the plane, linear or not linear.
 

Class Summary
AffineTransform2D Base class for linear (i.e. affine) transform in the plane.
Angle2D This class is only devoted to static computations.
BezierCurve2D An extension of the Bezier curve provided in java.awt.geom, with support for SmoothCurve2D and OrientedCurve2D.
BoundaryPolyCurve2D A continuous oriented curve, composed of several Continuous oriented curves, and which defines one singly-connected planar domain.
BoundarySet2D A BoundarySet2D is a set of continuous oriented curves.
Box2D Box2D defines a rectangle with edges parrallel to main axis.
Circle2D A circle in the plane, defined as the set of points located at an equal distance from the circle center.
CircleArc2D A circle arc.
CircleInversion2D circle inversion : performs a bijection between points outside the circle and points inside the circle.
CircleProjection2D basic projection on a circle, starting from the center.
ClosedPolyline2D Extends Polyline2D, by considering the last point is connected to the first one.
ContinuousOrientedCurveSet2D A set of continuous and oriented curves.
CurveSet2D A CurveSet2D is a set of curves.
Dimension2D An utilitary class used for describing size of bounding boxes for shapes, or size of shapes.
Disc2D A domain of the plane whose boundary is a circle.
Domain2D A domain defined from its boundary.
Ellipse2D An ellipse in the plane.
EllipseArc2D An arc of ellipse.
EmptySet2D An empty set is a shape which does not contain any point.
GeneralPath2D The GeneralPath class represents a geometric path constructed from straight lines, and quadratic and cubic (Bézier) curves.
HalfPlane2D a Half-plane, delimited by a straight line.
Homothecy2D Defines a homothetic transform.
HRectangle2D Deprecated. use Box2D instead
Hyperbola2D Superclass for all linear and pieces smooth curves : polylines, conics, lines ...
Label2D A label is a text located at a given position.
LineArc2D LineArc2D is a generic class to represent edges, straight lines, and rays.
LineObject2D Straight Object defined from 2 points.
LineProjection2D orthogonal projection on a line.
LineSegment2D Straight Edge defined by two points.
LineSymmetry2D interface for projections in the plane : projections on a line, on a circle, ...
Parabola2D A parabola, defined by its vertex, its orientation, and its pedal.
ParametricConic2D A parametric Conic is defined direclty from its parametric equation: a*x^2 + b*x*y + c*y^2 + d*x + e*y + f
Point2D Define a point in 2 Dimensions.
PointSet2D Represent the union of a finite number of Point2D.
PointSymmetry2D Transform each point with its symmetric with respect to a point.
PolarPoint2D Define a point with two polar coordinates : rho and theta.
PolarVector2D A simple class whoich reprensents polar coordinate in 2D.
PolyBezierCurve2D A set of bezier curves, making a continuous curve.
PolyCurve2D A PolyCurve2D is a set of piecewise smooth curve arcs, such that the end of a curve is the beginning of the next curve, and such that they do not intersect nor self-intersect.
Polygon2D Represent a polygonal domain whose boundary is a single closed polyline.
Polyline2D A polyline is a continuous curve where each piece of the curve is a LineSegment2D.
PolyOrientedCurve2D A PolyOrientedCurve2D is a set of piecewise smooth curve arcs, such that the end of a curve is the beginning of the next curve, and such that they do not intersect nor self-intersect.
Ray2D Ray, or half-line.
Rectangle2D Rectangle2D defines a rectangle rotated around its first corner.
Rotation2D Rotate a shape around a point with a given angle.
Scaling2D Rescale a shape in the 2 main directions of the axis, centered at the origin.
StraightLine2D Representation of straigth lines.
StraightObject2D Base class for straight curves, such as straight lines, rays, or edges.
Translation2D Transform each point by translating it by a given vector.
Vector2D Define a vector in 2 Dimensions.
 

Package math.geom2d Description

geom2d: planar geometry toolbox.

The package defines a hierarchy of shapes classified along their inner dimension: Point2D, Curve2D, Domain2D.
